Service Details: - Offers two English programs in Kelowna: ESL, two levels- EAP (English for Academic Purposes), four levels- Classes include Reading, Writing, Listening, and Speaking
Eligibility: - Permanent Residents and Canadian students are eligible to apply to the ESL programs.- Landed Immigrant status, Permanent Resident, Refugee status or Canadian Citizenship documents are required.
Cost: Program ; Please visit our website for information on current fees.  Financial assistance may be available; please visit our website for details.
